about_the_game:
"ROBOT OX" is an engaging 2D action game crafted using Unity, unfolding a thrilling tale of adventure centered around robots. In this game, players embody a formidable bull-shaped mechanical being known as "ROBOT OX." ROBOT OX acts as the protector of his homeland, embarking on a journey filled with challenges and strife to safeguard the peace and tranquility of his abode.

Within this fantastical world of mechanical wonders, ROBOT OX must confront various dangerous foes and trials. Apart from facing off against mainline bosses, as players traverse through different levels, defeating certain enemies causes them to drop powerful weapons, enhancing ROBOT OX's strength and prowess.

Players will immerse themselves in a world brimming with surprises and thrills as they follow ROBOT OX's growth and adventures. Through meticulously designed levels and adversaries, players will experience exhilarating battles, and endless challenges.

The story of ROBOT OX transcends a mere robotic escapade, delving into themes of courage, friendship, and guardianship. In this journey filled with passion and emotion, ROBOT OX will prove himself not merely as a mechanical entity but as a true hero. Facing all challenges fearlessly to protect his homeland, he will demonstrate his mettle and emerge as a beacon of hope in the face of adversity.
